verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* enter \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w judgment|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Cursing, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w lying|strong="H3584"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w killing|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* theft, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* have overflowed, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* hath \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* dwelleth \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w languish|strong="H0535"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* air: yea, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fishes \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0389"\w* \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w judge|strong="H7378"\w*: \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w a|strong="H3198"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* rebuked: \w for|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0376"\w* contradict \w the|strong="H0389"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H0517"\w* \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee: \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w made|strong="H1571"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* silent.

\w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* been silent, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H0430"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w reject|strong="H3988"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* office \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3547"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou hast \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

According to \w the|strong="H3651"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H2398"\w* them \w so|strong="H3651"\w* have \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w me|strong="H2398"\w*: \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H2398"\w* \w change|strong="H4171"\w* \w their|strong="H4171"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w into|strong="H4171"\w* \w shame|strong="H7036"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5375"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w repay|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* devices.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* committed fornication, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* ceased: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w observing|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* law.

Fornication, \w and|strong="H3196"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H3196"\w* drunkenness \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* consulted \w their|strong="H3588"\w* stocks, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w staff|strong="H4731"\w* hath \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* unto \w them|strong="H8478"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* fornication hath \w deceived|strong="H8582"\w* \w them|strong="H8478"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* committed fornication \w against|strong="H5046"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*: \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w oak|strong="H0424"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poplar|strong="H3839"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* turpentine tree, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* thereof \w was|strong="H7218"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w commit|strong="H5003"\w* fornication, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* spouses \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w be|strong="H1389"\w* \w adulteresses|strong="H5003"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* shell \w commit|strong="H5003"\w* fornication, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* spouses \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w commit|strong="H5003"\w* \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* conversed \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w harlots|strong="H2181"\w*, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* effeminate, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* beaten.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w play|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w at|strong="H3478"\w* least \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* Juda offend: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* ye \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* Galgal, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* Bethaven, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*: \w The|strong="H0935"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath gone astray \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* wanton \w heifer|strong="H6510"\w*: \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w them|strong="H7462"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* spacious \w place|strong="H4800"\w*.
\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w is|strong="H0669"\w* \w a|strong="H0669"\w* partaker \w with|strong="H2266"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w*, let him alone.

\w Their|strong="H5493"\w* banquet \w is|strong="H4043"\w* \w separated|strong="H5493"\w*, \w they|strong="H5493"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* \w gone|strong="H5493"\w* astray \w by|strong="H0157"\w* fornication: \w they|strong="H5493"\w* that should \w have|strong="H0157"\w* protected \w them|strong="H0157"\w* \w have|strong="H0157"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w to|strong="H0157"\w* bring \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* upon \w them|strong="H0157"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* hath bound \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H2077"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w they|strong="H0954"\w* shall be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* because \w of|strong="H7307"\w* their \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*.
